alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 16 at 3:39PM EDT until March 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible with snowfall amounts in excess of 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph near the Lake Superior shoreline and in open areas. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact multiple morning and evening commutes through Saturday. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be preceded by a period of rain this evening before a change over to wet snow late tonight. This may lead to slick road conditions tonight into early Friday. Lake effect snow will get heavy late Friday afternoon and last into Saturday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
